issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

1.Views>scroll views>scroll views text area
2.enter multiple lines in the field (enough to warrant scrolling)
3.move focus to another field, then try to scroll the field in step 2

results: the entire field shows focus, but cannot scroll the lines up or down

{html}
fields.summary: Android: Unable to scroll field with multiple lines

comments.body:
{html}

This seems to be an issue with the size of the control in the test. It's possible that it was caused by an OOM earlier in the test process.

Could not duplicate.

{html}
